example.name: abstract event
example.text: James L. Pate was named a director of this oil concern, *trace* expanding the board to 14 members.

roleset.note: The trace looks back to the entire event of naming James Pate to the board, but there is no syntactic node which holds this in exclusion to the expand predicate. Nor would it be correct to link the trace to James Pate, because he is not expanding the board--whoever named him --> --to the board is the one causing the expansion. Thus a naked trace.
